definition[0]: to enjoy sitting or lying in the heat of the sun or a fire
example[0]: Lizards were basking in the morning sun.
definition[1]: if a place basks in the sun, it is sunny and warm
example[1]: Tenerife was basking in afternoon sunshine as they arrived.
definition[2]: to enjoy the approval or attention that you are getting from other people
example[2]: She basked in the admiration of the media.
